message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this great product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $140 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering the product. I believe I can offer you $120 for it.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest.  Could you do $130? I think that's very fair for the value you're getting.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I am willing to pay $125 for the product.
